definition: dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
old variant of 捨|舍[she3]
residence
surname She
(dialect) what
dialectal equivalent of 沒什麼|没什么[mei2 shen2 me5]
call a spade a spade (idiom)
call a spade a spade (idiom)
dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]

sentences.english: Hard to drink, and drink around a long time that nothing effects.
sentences.chinese: 好難喝的，周圍長時間喝的說沒啥效果。

sentences.english: The next morning, he asks the monks what the sound was, but they say, "We can't tell you."
sentences.chinese: 第二天一大早，男子就問和尚，那聲音是啥呀。

sentences.english: Why is it wrong to stick to my own value of love?
sentences.chinese: 堅持自己的愛情觀有啥不對？

sentences.english: Juts a joke, don't get too serious.
sentences.chinese: 一篇在硅谷盛傳的笑話，你以爲你老闆在想啥？

sentences.english: The name of the rabbit is not recorded.
sentences.chinese: 不知道那兔子叫啥名字。

sentences.english: Keep your attention on a woman's eyes and she'll let you know when the opportunity to seduce her is present.
sentences.chinese: 注意女人的眼睛，她會告訴你啥時誘惑她正當時。

sentences.english: And what's this brighter light blue-green ?
To experienced software people, none of this is very surprising.
sentences.chinese: 有經驗的軟件人對此已經不覺得有啥大驚小怪的了。

sentences.english: He spoke enigmatically. Nobody knew what he had up his sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 他說得陰陽怪氣的，肚子裏不知畫的是啥道理。

sentences.english: What would you create if you were picked as a Semi-Finalist?
sentences.chinese: 假設你被選爲決選者，你想要創造啥？

sentences.english: Wait a minute, what did I do with the other one?
sentences.chinese: 等等，另一個東西我派啥用場啦？

sentences.english: No comment. I'm not going to say anything.
In what ways is such questioning relevant today anyway?
sentences.chinese: 卟菅咋樣，這種質詢法媞苡啥方式影響到當偂？

sentences.english: I didnt know I had charm.
sentences.chinese: 我都不知道我有啥魅力。

sentences.english: The Qiao Fu is tough is one impossible mission, the nobody comes us to have what recruit son.
sentences.chinese: 巧婦難爲無米之炊啊，沒人來咱能有啥招兒。

sentences.english: All right. What am I trying to say?

definition: what?/something/anything
dialectal equivalent of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
gnaw
loud noise/shout/suddenly
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
variant of 咱[zan2]
erhua variant of 點|点[dian3]
(dialect) what
exclamatory final particle
interrogative final particle
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
tiny/insignificant
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
